## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Power Generation System (Updated)
- **Offshore pump** at (-9.5, 19.5) - Now connected to water system (fluid_system 13850)
- **Boiler** at (18.0, 22.5) - Fueled with coal (39 units), producing steam at 165°C but still no input liquid connection
- **Steam engine** at (22.5, 22.5) - Still unconnected to power network despite adjacent poles
- **New offshore pump** at (-9.5, -0.5) - Added but not connected to any system

### Oil Processing Complex (Updated)
- **Pumpjack** at (17.5, 40.5) - Still unpowered despite adjacent poles
- **Oil refinery** at (27.5, 40.5) - Now has crude oil in fluid box (200 units) but remains unpowered
- **Extended pipe network** - New crude oil pipes (fluid_system 13849) connecting pumpjack area to refinery

### Chemical Production Setup
- **Chemical plant** at (37.5, 22.5) - Still unpowered with sulfur recipe set
- **Storage tank** at (32.5, 22.5) - Now connected via pipe-to-ground but empty
- **Wooden chest** added at (40.5, 22.5) - Empty output target

## ERROR TIPS

### Persistent Fluid Connection Issues (Critical)
- **Blocked connection points** - Verify all connection points are clear before pipe routing (recurring refinery connection failures)
- **Power verification** - Check power status before fluid transfer attempts (pumpjack/refinery power issues)
- **Fluid presence validation** - Confirm source has fluid before connection (empty storage tank connections)
- **Direction alignment** - Ensure pipe routing matches entity connection directions (chemical plant input mismatch)

### Power System Deficiencies
- **Critical component power** - Prioritize power connection for production chain elements (refinery/pumpjack)
- **Network coverage gaps** - Verify power pole placement covers all buildings (steam engine isolation)
- **Steam system validation** - Check water input before expecting steam output (boiler input issues)

### System Validation Best Practices
- **Pre-connection diagnostics** - Implement connection point verification routine
- **Power audit** - Systematically check power network coverage
- **Fluid system isolation** - Test subsystems independently before full integration
- **Entity status monitoring** - Check warnings/status flags before operations

### Connection Protocol
- **Clearance checks** - Physically verify connection point accessibility
- **Fluid type matching** - Validate compatible fluids between systems
- **Distance limitations** - Respect maximum pipe run distances
- **Subsystem testing** - Verify individual components before system integration

## NAMESPACE

### Functions
- `connect_fluid_system()` - Requires pre-validation for power/fluid presence
- `verify_power_connection()` - Needs implementation of network coverage check

### Variables
- `steam_engine_pos` - Still unconnected despite multiple attempts
- `refinery_pos` - Now has crude oil but power issue persists
- `chemical_plant_pos` - Multiple connection attempts failed
- `output_chest_pos` - Defined but remains unused
